You make it possible, Colorado

Since selling our first ticket in 1983, the Colorado Lottery has been on a mission to make our state a better place to live, play, and enjoy the great outdoors. Thanks to our incredible players, we’ve invested billions in projects that protect Colorado’s natural beauty and support our schools. From hiking trails on the Western Slope to playgrounds on the Eastern Plains, Lottery proceeds touch every corner of the state and ensure future generations can experience the same awe-inspiring views and adventures. Explore the Lottery-funded projects in your region.

▶See the fun the Lottery funds
